version_description:
• Updated app icon
• Updated languages

• Digital Petro-Points card
• Automatic login with “Remember me” feature
• Easier way to search for your favourite rewards
• Notifications

• Fixed an issue with password field on 2nd step of registration page
• Improved display of registration and join page
• Fixed an issue when temporary password is being changed.
• Fixed security issue while you're browsing our locations
• Modified app screenshots

• Minor changes to our available options
• Extended push notifications support to iOS 10

• Fixed location issue for iOS 10 so the app can now prompt the user for permission
• Changed labeling for rewards
• Minor change to notifications
• Fixed A5 issue when the app is launched.

• Improved Petro-Points Rewards functionality
• Fixed issue that was causing session to be loss on some links
• Fixed option selection for statements

• Fixed login issue that some users were experiencing
• Added tracking code

• Minor design changes
• Fixed Geolocation issue

• Fixed geolocation issue
• Minor design changes
• Fixed issue with password on registration process

• Minor design changes
• Fixed Geolocation issue

We’ve heard your feedback and have completely redesigned our app. Now with automatic sign-in and improved features like an in-app digital wallet, station finder and account management. Also, we’re excited about what’s coming soon: buy a car wash, buy and reload your favourite cards, redeem for even more rewards in-app, and so much more.

We’re constantly working to enhance our new app. This update includes:
•an improved digital Petro-Points card experience for some users having trouble scanning
•an update to Face ID for some users with repeat prompts
•additional bug fixes

We’re constantly working to enhance our new app. This update includes:
• minor bug fixes

Car wash fans, this one's for you - now you can activate the car wash directly from the cards in your app wallet.
We've also added a new menu button to quickly access popular features.
Oh, and we have some minor bug fixes too.

We’re constantly working to enhance our new app. This update includes:
•minor bug fixes

We’re constantly working to enhance our new app. This update includes:
•minor bug fixes

We’re constantly working to enhance our new app. This update includes:
•minor bug fixes

We’ve heard the feedback and we have good news – we’re working on preparing our Petro-Points barcodes to be used in Apple Wallet.
To make sure you can seamlessly collect your Petro-Points through the transition, we’ve included the ability to access an alternate version of your card within the app. In this update:
• swipe up or down on your Petro-Points barcode to access the alternate version
• we also have some minor bug fixes
